document.heading: CLINICAL LABORATORY PRACTITIONERS AMENDMENT ACT OF 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-272, the “Clinical Laboratory Practitioners Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-289. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2014, and December 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 2, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-618 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-272 became effective May 2, 2015.
